meanings.definition: Resembling a corm in structure or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cormoid flower had a round, swollen base.
meanings.sent2: The garden had many cormoid plants with thick stems.
meanings.sent3: The cormoid vegetable looked like a small, chubby potato.
meanings.sent4: Her cormoid necklace was as sturdy as an oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The cormoid rock stood out among the smooth pebbles.
